33 class ConnectionStatusObserverInterface {
34 public:
42  enum class Status {
50  DISCONNECTED,
51 
59  PENDING,
60 
68  CONNECTED,
69 
72  };
73 
81  enum class ChangedReason {
82 
90  ACL_CLIENT_REQUEST,
91 
99  ACL_DISABLED,
100 
108  DNS_TIMEDOUT,
109 
117  CONNECTION_TIMEDOUT,
118 
126  CONNECTION_THROTTLED,
127 
135  INVALID_AUTH,
136 
144  PING_TIMEDOUT,
145 
153  WRITE_TIMEDOUT,
161  READ_TIMEDOUT,
162 
170  FAILURE_PROTOCOL_ERROR,
171 
179  INTERNAL_ERROR,
180 
188  SERVER_INTERNAL_ERROR,
189 
197  SERVER_SIDE_DISCONNECT,
198 
206  SERVER_ENDPOINT_CHANGED
207  };
208 
216  virtual ~ConnectionStatusObserverInterface() = default;
217 
229  virtual void onConnectionStatusChanged(const Status status, const ChangedReason reason) = 0;
230 };
231 
245 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& stream, ConnectionStatusObserverInterface::Status status) {
246  switch (status) {
247  case ConnectionStatusObserverInterface::Status::DISCONNECTED:
248  stream << "DISCONNECTED";
249  break;
250  case ConnectionStatusObserverInterface::Status::PENDING:
251  stream << "PENDING";
252  break;
253  case ConnectionStatusObserverInterface::Status::CONNECTED:
254  stream << "CONNECTED";
255  break;
256  /*case ConnectionStatusObserverInterface::Status::POST_CONNECTED:
257  stream << "POST_CONNECTED";
258  break;
259  */
260  }
261  return stream;
262 }
263 
277 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& stream, ConnectionStatusObserverInterface::ChangedReason reason) {
278  switch (reason) {
279  case ConnectionStatusObserverInterface::ChangedReason::ACL_CLIENT_REQUEST:
280  stream << "ACL_CLIENT_REQUEST";
281  break;
282  case ConnectionStatusObserverInterface::ChangedReason::ACL_DISABLED:
283  stream << "ACL_DISABLED";
284  break;
285  case ConnectionStatusObserverInterface::ChangedReason::DNS_TIMEDOUT:
286  stream << "DNS_TIMEDOUT";
287  break;
288  case ConnectionStatusObserverInterface::ChangedReason::CONNECTION_TIMEDOUT:
289  stream << "CONNECTION_TIMEDOUT";
290  break;
291  case ConnectionStatusObserverInterface::ChangedReason::CONNECTION_THROTTLED:
292  stream << "CONNECTION_THROTTLED";
293  break;
294  case ConnectionStatusObserverInterface::ChangedReason::INVALID_AUTH:
295  stream << "INVALID_AUTH";
296  break;
297  case ConnectionStatusObserverInterface::ChangedReason::PING_TIMEDOUT:
298  stream << "PING_TIMEDOUT";
299  break;
300  case ConnectionStatusObserverInterface::ChangedReason::WRITE_TIMEDOUT:
301  stream << "WRITE_TIMEDOUT";
302  break;
303  case ConnectionStatusObserverInterface::ChangedReason::READ_TIMEDOUT:
304  stream << "READ_TIMEDOUT";
305  break;
306  case ConnectionStatusObserverInterface::ChangedReason::FAILURE_PROTOCOL_ERROR:
307  stream << "FAILURE_PROTOCOL_ERROR";
308  break;
309  case ConnectionStatusObserverInterface::ChangedReason::INTERNAL_ERROR:
310  stream << "INTERNAL_ERROR";
311  break;
312  case ConnectionStatusObserverInterface::ChangedReason::SERVER_INTERNAL_ERROR:
313  stream << "SERVER_INTERNAL_ERROR";
314  break;
315  case ConnectionStatusObserverInterface::ChangedReason::SERVER_SIDE_DISCONNECT:
316  stream << "SERVER_SIDE_DISCONNECT";
317  break;
318  case ConnectionStatusObserverInterface::ChangedReason::SERVER_ENDPOINT_CHANGED:
319  stream << "SERVER_ENDPOINT_CHANGED";
320  break;
321  }
322  return stream;
323 }
